message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties if you were to acquire this item at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects its immense value to you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the introductory price, I'm looking to invest in this product at a slightly lower price point. I'd be happy to buy it for $1,050,000. This price reflects the value I see in the product and would allow for a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. To ensure a fair deal for both parties, I am willing to consider your offer. However, I must maintain a minimum price to reflect the true value of the product. Therefore, I am proposing to sell the product to you for $1,100,000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further.  While I value your product, I'm still hoping to secure a price closer to my initial offer. I'm willing to go up to $1,075,000, which is a fair compromise considering the value we both see in this product.

Dear Bob, thank you for your continued interest in our product. I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair agreement. In light of our previous discussions, I am prepared to offer the product to you for $1,085,000. This price reflects the value of the product while allowing us to come closer to your initial proposal.
